channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【API Gateway】API网关
item.description: 【API Gateways are essential components in modern software architectures, particularly microservices-based systems.】API 网关是现代软件架构中的重要组件，特别是基于微服务的系统。

item.title: 【How Netflix Warms Petabytes of Cache Data】Netflix 如何加热 PB 级缓存数据

item.title: 【EP131: How Uber Served 40 Million Reads with Integrated Redis Cache? 】EP131：Uber 如何通过集成 Redis 缓存提供 4000 万次读取服务？
item.description: 【This week’s system design refresher:】本周的系统设计复习：

item.title: 【Software Architecture Patterns】软件架构模式
item.description: 【Software architects often encounter similar goals and problems repeatedly throughout their careers.】软件架构师在其职业生涯中经常会反复遇到类似的目标和问题。

item.title: 【Infrastructure as Code】基础设施即代码
item.description: 【It is difficult to imagine modern businesses operating without a scalable process to provision and manage the infrastructure.】很难想象现代企业在没有可扩展的流程来配置和管理基础设施的情况下运营。

item.title: 【The Saga Pattern】传奇模式
item.description: 【In enterprise applications, nearly every request is executed within a database transaction.】在企业应用程序中，几乎每个请求都在数据库事务中执行。

item.title: 【How Uber Scaled Cassandra for Tens of Millions of Queries Per Second?】Uber 如何扩展 Cassandra 以支持每秒数千万次查询？
